case
discussions this whole project started
in 2004 while I was working out here in

in New Orleans and at that point I
became what I call a a tiger
cousin that remote tutoring over the

started tutoring her Brothers U then
word Rock got around in the family that
free tutoring was going on and so I

help yourself scale up why don't you

Youtube is for cats playing piano it is
